goals.title: Protect my income
goals.description: When something happens, like getting sick or injured, you still need to cover the important things like your household expenses and loan repayments
points: How much insurance do I need?

goals.title: Goal 2
goals.description: As Australia's cost of living continues to rise, it's important to make sure your money goes the distance in retirement to give you the lifestyle you want.
points: Will I be eligible for the Age Pension?
Will I work less, stop working or do something different?
